name: Spamdos
description:
Spamdos is a game based on the Pizza Jam theme of Spam, the 1945 Irish St. Leger race winning horse. 

  • Click the spam button at the bottom of the start and tutorial page to start. 
  • Shoot the spam into the ghosts with the up arrow
  • The longer you press the up arrow the higher the hit will be
  • Clear the bread off the table to allow more room for spam
  • If the ghost's timer runs out they will disappear and take some of your health with them. 

If I had more time:

  • I would have created a more dynamic background that changed or animated between levels. 
  • The ghosts have the ability to ask for different food, but there was not enough time to create  more animated food. So its just bread and spam, yum! 
  • Upload to itch Properly and with time to spare!
  • More Spam!! 
  • Spam, ahaaaaaaaaa, saviour of the universe!
